name: Lazy Dragon
description:
an automatic shoot em' up where you can't die!

make sure to click FULLSCREEN! (and press Esc to exit)

play as a Lazy Dragon named Mitzy (apparently)!

3 levels!

3 powerups!

suggestive voicelines!

a game breaking bug that is actually called New Game+!

use the arrow keys or mouse or touch (not tested) to move up and down

this is my first game, if it wasn't clear
